title: The Elder Cerebral Fluid
data:
| \*   The Elder Cerebral Fluid   [![White gem.png](/images/d/d4/White_gem.png)](/wiki/File:White_gem.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                                                                                                | [dilithium crystal](/wiki/Dilithium_crystal "Dilithium crystal")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Affiliation                                                                                              | - [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful")
- [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder")
- [quest artifacts](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifacts "Intelligent artifacts")                                                                                                                                                         |
|                                                                                                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| When carried                                                                                             | * enhanced [energy regeneration](/wiki/Energy_regeneration "Energy regeneration")
* [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage")as a weapon:* +1d10 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit")
* double damage versus non-[mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless") monsters
* drains [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence")
* may [cancel](/wiki/Cancel "Cancel") non-mindless monster on hit |
| When looted                                                                                              | - can be used as a [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber "Lightsaber") crystal ([loot](/wiki/Loot "Loot") the lightsaber on the ground)
- can only be used as crystal for [The Illithid Staff](/wiki/The_Illithid_Staff "The Illithid Staff")                                                                                                                                                                          |
| When invoked                                                                                             | *(none)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Base price                                                                                               | 9999 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| Weight                                                                                                   | [1](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |

**The Elder Cerebral Fluid** is the [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), and is the prize for completing the [Illithanachronounbinder quest](/index.php?title=Illithanachronounbinder_quest\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Illithanachronounbinder quest (page does not exist)"). Its default [alignment](/wiki/Alignment "Alignment") is [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [dilithium crystal](/wiki/Dilithium_crystal "Dilithium crystal").

## Generation

The Elder Cerebral Fluid cannot be [wished](/wiki/Wish "Wish") for, and is reverted to its base item if left in a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") file.

For Illithanachronounbinders, The Elder Cerebral Fluid is always generated on the goal level of the Illithanachronounbinder quest, where it is placed on [Menzoberranzan](/index.php?title=Menzoberranzan\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Menzoberranzan (page does not exist)")'s square at level creation.

## Description

While carried, The Elder Cerebral Fluid grants enhanced [energy regeneration](/wiki/Energy_regeneration "Energy regeneration") and [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"). If used as [sling](/wiki/Sling "Sling") ammo, it has a +1d10 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus and deals double damage against a non-[mindless](/wiki/Mindless "Mindless") target with an extra effect on hit: for the [hero](/wiki/Hero "Hero"), it drains their [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence"), and for non-mindless monsters it has a chance of [canceling](/wiki/Canceling "Canceling") them.

As a [gem](/wiki/Gem "Gem"), The Elder Cerebral Fluid can be used as a [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber "Lightsaber") "focus" crystal (done by [looting](/wiki/Loot "Loot") the lightsaber while it is on the ground), but it can only be used this way for [The Illithid Staff](/wiki/The_Illithid_Staff "The Illithid Staff"): doing so enables the ability to [invoke](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") The Illithid Staff's "Elder Memories" power, which is necessary for a full-scoring ascension.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=The_Elder_Cerebral_Fluid\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
The Elder Cerebral Fluid

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
*   The Elder Cerebral Fluid  
Base item dilithium crystal
Affiliation
  • lawful
  • Illithanachronounbinder
  • quest artifacts
  • intelligent
When carried
  • enhanced energy regeneration
  • half spell damage
as a weapon:
  • +1d10 to-hit
  • double damage versus non-mindless monsters
  • drains intelligence
  • may cancel non-mindless monster on hit
When looted
  • can be used as a lightsaber crystal
    (loot the lightsaber on the ground)
  • can only be used as crystal for The Illithid Staff
When invoked (none)
Base price 9999 zm
Weight 1

The Elder Cerebral Fluid is the Illithanachronounbinder quest artifact in notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, and is the prize for completing the Illithanachronounbinder quest. Its default alignment is lawful, and its base item is a dilithium crystal.

Generation

The Elder Cerebral Fluid cannot be wished for, and is reverted to its base item if left in a bones file.

For Illithanachronounbinders, The Elder Cerebral Fluid is always generated on the goal level of the Illithanachronounbinder quest, where it is placed on Menzoberranzan's square at level creation.

Description

While carried, The Elder Cerebral Fluid grants enhanced energy regeneration and half spell damage. If used as sling ammo, it has a +1d10 to-hit bonus and deals double damage against a non-mindless target with an extra effect on hit: for the hero, it drains their intelligence, and for non-mindless monsters it has a chance of canceling them.

As a gem, The Elder Cerebral Fluid can be used as a lightsaber "focus" crystal (done by looting the lightsaber while it is on the ground), but it can only be used this way for The Illithid Staff: doing so enables the ability to invoke The Illithid Staff's "Elder Memories" power, which is necessary for a full-scoring ascension.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=The_Elder_Cerebral_Fluid&oldid=175534"
